profile.name: Gabriel
profile.title: Head of EU Technology
profile.description: 20 years of experience working on IT, specially on software development and innovation teams. Extremely goals oriented, always looking for the easiest way to get things work.

challenges.description:
Reporting to the European CIO, I design the cross-country tech strategy
for our European businesses, in collaboration with the local CTOs,
and I lead the team in charge of the implementation of such an European
tech strategy.

Direction of the technical team (50 people) that gives cross service to
all the Group’s insurance companies in Europe in the following areas:
• Cloud strategy, governance and migration to the public cloud
(AWS)
• Security program (ISP)
• Global Architecture
• Development and

I have had dierent stages in the last years:
• Since 2015, leading the technological renovation process,
transforming legacy desktop solutions into innovative newgeneration
products. I manage the technological strategy of
Berger Levrault in Spain. I also participate as a technical reference
in international projects from the Berger Levrault group.
• In the period 2013-2015: leading the area of eGovernment, Architecture
and Integrations. With a large team of development
engineers we develop leading solutions in Document Management,
BPM, Portals, eProcurement, Business Intelligence and
mobile apps for Spanish Local Government.
• Previously, I assumed Technical Product Manager role in the Finance
Area, leading development teams and projects.
